hero.subtitle: Learn about
hero.title:
Kid’s Playroom
Monitoring
hero.text:
Monitor your kids TV and video game consumption to prevent abuse.

Use the sensors available on your mobile device to monitor your environment.

items.title: Promote health TV and video game usage habits.
items.text: Measure how many minutes of TV and Video game your kids are consuming.

items.title: Help prevent your kids from suffering from eyestrain.
items.text: Get alerted when your kids are watching TV in the dark, a condition that might results in dry tired eye, and potentially cause headache to your kids.

items.title: Have fun and enjoy social and easy to use environment.
items.text: Get daily photo and video highlights from your kids room to save as souvenir or share on Facebook and Twitter.

items.title: Help prevent hearing losses.
items.text: Monitor the noise level in the play room and ensure that the TV volume is set at a healthy level. Get alerted when it goes above limits.

items.title: Know what your kids are watching.
items.text: Get live images from the play room, see what your kids are doing and what they are watching.

items.title: News Feed Elements
items.text: News feed elements are built from the data gathered by your TV Monitoring solution. They will appear in your News Feed and are update on regular basis by our intelligent system.

images.title: Real time live picture
images.text: Real time live picture from your device updated every 5 seconds.

images.title: Real time sound level
images.text: Real time sound level from your device. Updated every second. Unit in pseudo-decibel.

images.title: TV watched over last 24h
images.text: Real time vibration level. Updated every 1 second.

items.title: Alerts and Notifications
items.text: Alerts occur when signals capture by your solution reach pre-defined threshold. Each Alert triggered actions that can be individually managed. Certain alert thresholds can be adjusted under your solution settings.

lists.title: TV ON for more 1h
lists.text: Triggered after the TV has been ON for 1h on the calendar same day.

items.text: SMS notification (US and Canada, email otherwise)
GIF event created to Gallery

lists.title: High sound level
lists.text: Triggered when high sound level is detected by your TV Monitoring solution.

items.text: Email notification
Alert posted in News Feed

items.title: Live Actions
items.text: Actions can be triggered from your live panel to communicate with people watching TV.
